headline: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy for the New Year
summary: Warren Buffett has generated tremendous wealth for Berkshire Hathaway investors.  Anyone can benefit from his exceptional business insights by taking a peak at the stocks in Berkshire's portfolio.  Here's why three Motley Fool contributors believe Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO), NVR (NYSE: NVR), and Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) are solid buys heading into the new year.

headline: If I Had To Invest $100,000 In A Dividend Growth Portfolio Right Now, Here's What I Would Buy
summary: The methodology uses earnings yield, dividend yield, and 5-year dividend CAGR to score and rank 55 stocks across all 11 sectors.
